gpt4oMini.descriptionLong: Fast and cost-efficient model, perfect for most tasks.

gpt4o.descriptionLong: High-quality model for complex reasoning and accurate responses.

gpt5.descriptionLong: Most advanced OpenAI model with superior capabilities and reasoning.

claudeHaiku.description: NEW: Small model with big capabilities
claudeHaiku.descriptionLong: NEW: Small model with big capabilities - great value

geminiFlash.descriptionLong: Fast Google AI model with multimodal capabilities.

deepseek.descriptionLong: Advanced reasoning model with strong performance.

grok.descriptionLong: Powerful AI model from xAI with advanced capabilities.

generateImage.descriptionLong: Create stunning AI-generated images from text descriptions.

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.prompt: Create an image in a cyberpunk aesthetic: vivid neon accents, futuristic textures, glowing details, and high-contrast lighting.

anime.name: Anime
anime.prompt: Create an image in an anime art style: clean lines, vibrant colors, expressive characters, and detailed backgrounds with a Japanese animation aesthetic.

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.prompt: Create an image in a minimalist style: clean, simple composition with plenty of white space, limited color palette, and focus on essential elements only.

watercolor.name: Watercolor
watercolor.prompt: Create an image in a watercolor painting style: soft, flowing colors that blend naturally, visible brush strokes, and delicate, artistic textures.

vintage.name: Vintage
vintage.prompt: Create an image with a vintage aesthetic: sepia tones, aged textures, classic composition, and nostalgic mood reminiscent of old photographs.

photorealistic.name: Photorealistic
photorealistic.prompt: Create a photorealistic image: highly detailed, accurate lighting, realistic textures, and lifelike appearance as if captured by a professional camera.

abstract.name: Abstract
abstract.prompt: Create an abstract image: non-representational forms, bold colors, geometric or fluid shapes, and expressive artistic interpretation.

coloringBook.name: Coloring Book
coloringBook.prompt: Create an image in a coloring book style: black line art on white background, clear outlines, simple shapes perfect for coloring.

synthwave.name: Synthwave
synthwave.prompt: Create an image in a synthwave aesthetic: retro-futuristic 1980s vibe with neon grids, glowing sunset, vibrant magenta-and-cyan gradients, chrome highlights, and a nostalgic outrun atmosphere.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ChatLearn
faq.question1: What can I do with this AI?
faq.answer1: You can chat, create images, write texts, learn new things, and even get coding help ‚Äî all in one place.
faq.answer2: Yes. Just start typing or speaking ‚Äî no setup needed.
faq.question3: Can it help me study or learn?
faq.answer3: Absolutely. The AI can explain topics, summarize notes, and answer your questions like a study buddy.
faq.question4: Can I create images with it?
faq.answer4: Yes. You can generate unique images instantly from your ideas.
faq.question5: Does it work in different languages?
faq.answer5: Yes. You can chat naturally in 50+ languages.
faq.answer6: Yes. From short messages to full articles, the AI helps you write faster and better.
faq.question7: Can I talk to it with my voice?
faq.answer7: Yes. You can use voice commands for hands-free conversations.
faq.question8: Is it good for fun too?
faq.answer8: Definitely. Chat casually, ask for jokes, or just have fun conversations.
